thread.title: Tom Brady, Wife Gisele Bundchen, & Kids - See Family Photos!
thread.title_full: Tom Brady, Wife Gisele Bundchen, & Kids - See Family Photos!

author: Just Jared
title: Tom Brady, Wife Gisele Bundchen, & Kids - See Family Photos!
text:
Tom Brady ‘s wife Gisele Bundchen is definitely cheering him on in the AFC Championship Game right now!
The 39-year-old quarterback is playing with the New England Patriots and his wife, 36, and his three kids – John , 9, Benjamin , 7, and Vivian , 4 – are definitely his biggest fans.
Tom and his ex Bridget Moynahan welcomed John in 2007. They split in December 2006 right around the time that she became pregnant. 
Gisele and Tom have been married since 2009 and they are the parents of Benjamin and Vivian . They both share a ton of photos of their kids across their social media pages and we’ve gathered some of the best recent pics in our gallery!
